name: Virus Vanquish
description:
Take control of your immune system's antibodies to defeat a horde of antigens!

You must constantly angle your body's antibodies in the direction of the oncoming antigens in order to kill them and protect your heart!

CONTROLS

  • W & D / Arrow Keys: Rotate centre

Virus Vanquish was made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #62.
Thanks to my friend Josh for the name suggestion!
Theme: "Viral Infection".
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
